name: 6th Dimension
description:
The 6th Dimension is a first person single player riddle and puzzle solving game.

You play as a traveler going through the 6th dimension.

Inside the 6th dimension you will find different eco-systems you must traverse.

You must find a way to get back to your dimension, in order to do this you must navigate all eco-systems within the 6th dimension and find all the sacred texts that will unlock the doors back to your reality.

Once you find the text, you will have to do a series of riddles and puzzles in order to collect the sacred text from that eco-system.

Let's hope you can make it back to reality.
